scripts.package: npm install && rm -f package.zip && cd src && zip -r /tmp/aws-lambda-ip-availability.zip ../node_modules .
scripts.create-cloudformation-stack: aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name aws-lambda-ip-availability --template-body file://aws/resources.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.update-cloudformation-stack: aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name aws-lambda-ip-availability --template-body file://aws/resources.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
